result.reason: ArgumentOutOfRangeException in TreeListView.RebuildObjectMap() caused by stale index after RemoveRange() during rapid collection-change events when editing connection fields
result.approach: Guard RebuildChildren() against stale index: check index != -1 before RemoveRange, and add bounds check in RebuildObjectMap loop; also throttle/debounce HandleCollectionChanged RefreshObject calls to prevent concurrent TreeListView state corruption
